```{r}
library(depmixS4)
df <- read.csv("output_new.csv")
df$phase <-factor(df$phase)
HMM_model <- depmix(len_40 ~ phase, nstates = 2, data = df)
HMM_fm <- fit(HMM_model, verbose = FALSE)
summary(HMM_fit)
```

```{r}
probs <- posterior(HMM_fm)
probs
```

```{r}
plot(probs)
```








```{r}
df <- read.csv("output_new.csv")
df$phase <-factor(df$phase)
df
```


```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(visreg)
library(modelsummary)
mod <- glm(len_data ~ phase, data = df, family = "poisson")
summary(mod)
#plot(mod, all.terms = TRUE)
visreg(mod)
```

```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(visreg)
library(modelsummary)
mod <- lm(len_40 ~ phase, data = df)
summary(mod)
#plot(mod, all.terms = TRUE)
visreg(mod)
```

```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(visreg)
```
```{r}
mod <- gam(mashup ~ phase, data = df, family = binomial(), method = "REML")
summary(mod)
plot(mod, all.terms = TRUE)
visreg(mod)
```



```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(visreg)
mod <- gam(len_data ~ phase, data = df, family = poisson(), method = "REML")
summary(mod)
plot(mod, all.terms = TRUE)
visreg(mod)
```


```{r}

summary(mod)
```
